events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role and will begin reviewing it promptly.
The application has been categorised under Engineering, specifically for the software development position as requested.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process going forward.
Initial screening completed successfully with the candidate showing strong understanding of key software engineering concepts.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm to proceed to the next stage involving a technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week with our senior development team.
Candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated excellent coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been arranged to discuss company culture fit and candidate expectations following technical success.
The HR interview went well; the candidate is aligned with our values and is enthusiastic about joining our engineering team.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including a competitive salary and benefits aligned with their experience level.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and is considering it seriously with a prompt response expected soon.
The candidate has accepted the offer and expressed excitement to start contributing to our software engineering projects.
Onboarding process has begun with an initial orientation session and setting up necessary development tools for the new hire.
The hiring process is now closed successfully; the candidate is officially part of the engineering team and ready to contribute.
